content:
@Pietro Albini have you seen https://docs.github.com/en/actions/reference/workflow-commands-for-github-actions ? It's kind of like how build scripts communicate back to Cargo — you print out a special message to standard out:

      - name: Set selected color
        run: echo '::set-env name=SELECTED_COLOR::green'

I bring this up because of group and endgroup — I feel like you were talking recently about how something in GHA output wasn't fine-grained enough. Maybe that would help?
